sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { gsap } from 'gsap'; import SlimGridMotion from '../components/SlimGridMotion'; const PavementSigns: React.FC = () => { const headingRef = useRef(null); const contentRef = useRef(null); const ctaRef = useRef(null); // Pavement signs images for SlimGridMotion const pavementImages = Array.from({ length: 21 }, (_, index) => { const imageNum = (index % 4) + 1; return `/pavement-signs/pavement${imageNum}.jpg`; }); useEffect(() => { const tl = gsap.timeline({ defaults: { ease: 'power3.out' } }); tl.fromTo( headingRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 40 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 1, delay: 0.3 } ) .fromTo( contentRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.9 }, '-=0.6' ) .fromTo( ctaRef.current, { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, { opacity: 1, y: 0, duration: 0.8 }, '-=0.4' ); }, []); const steps = [ { number: '1', title: 'Get a FREE quote', description: 'Choose from our range of pavement signs or A-boards. Already have a frame? Drop it off to us for customisation.', }, { number: '2', title: 'Design Stage', description: 'Send your artwork for a proof, or our design team will create visuals for you. Need a logo designed? We can help with that too.', }, { number: '3', title: 'Approve your order', description: 'After approval, we will get it into production which usually takes 5-10 working days. Got a deadline? Chat to our team.', }, { number: '4', title: 'Order up!', description: 'Collect from our Kidderminster shop or we can arrange posting (Delivery from £10).', } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}
{/* SlimGridMotion Background */}
{/* Dark Overlay */}
{/* Top Blur for Header */}
{/* Content */}

Capture the attention
of passers by

Our pavement signs come in a range of styles and sizes.

How It Works Get FREE Quote
{/* Bottom Vignette */}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How's it work?

{steps.map((step, index) => (
{step.number}

{step.title}

{step.description}

))}
{/* Eco Swing Section */}

Eco Swing Pavement Sign

Best for windy locations!

Our pavement signs come in a range of styles and sizes, designed to withstand different weather conditions and increase your footfall.

{[ 'Available in Small, Medium & Large sizes', 'Weather-resistant construction', 'Easy to update graphics', 'Suitable for all weather conditions' ].map((point, idx) => (

{point}

))}
A+
Wind Resistant Design
{/* Contact CTA */}

Ready to increase your footfall?

Get a free quote for your custom pavement sign

Get FREE Quote Call 01562 227 117
); }; export default PavementSigns;
